summary: I RECEIVED RECALL LETTER NHTSA RECALL 17V-184.CALLED NISSAN 804-378-3000.MADE APPT FOR RECALL,WAS ADVISED PART WAS THERE.UPON ARRIVING AT APPT. I WAS TOLD SORRY PARTS WERE THERE BUT NOW ARE ALL GONE.WE WILL ORDER AND PUT YOUR NAME ON IT AND CALL YOU IN A COUPLE WEEKS.IT HAS BEEN ALMOST 3 MONTHS NO CALL. I HAVE ATTEMPTED TO CALL AND NO ANSWER,LEFT SEVERAL MESSAGES NO CALL BACK.THIS IS MY FIRST MURANO AND I WANT TO DO THE RIGHT THING TO KEEP MY WARRANTY GOOD.I AM FRUSTRATED AND DO NOT KNOW WHAT TO DO.PLEASE ADVISE ME.THANK YOU.03
